trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Предоставляет типы <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> для модели автоматизации пользовательского интерфейса.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> class.
A new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> class.
Gets the control type for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.ComboBox" /> enumeration value.
Gets a collection of child elements.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
A collection of child elements.
Gets the name of the class that defines the type that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает имя класса, который определяет тип, связанный с данным объектом <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
A string that contains "ComboBox".
One of the enumeration values.
Gets the control pattern for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает шаблон для этого элемента управления <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="pattern" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Value" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, this method returns a reference to the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />; otherwise, this method calls the base implementation on <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SelectorAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Если параметр <paramref name="pattern" /> имеет значение <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Value" /> или <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, данный метод возвращает ссылку на текущий экземпляр объекта <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />; в противном случае данный метод вызывает базовую реализацию объекта <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SelectorAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard input focus on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Устанавливает фокус клавиатуры на элемент управления <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" />, связанный с данным объектом <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" /> control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> object cannot receive focus.
trans-unit.target: Элемент управления <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" />, связанный с объектом <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer" />, не может быть сфокусирован.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Данный тип или член поддерживает инфраструктуру [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] и не предназначен для непосредственного использования из кода.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState" /> for the current element.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Данный тип или член поддерживает инфраструктуру [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] и не предназначен для непосредственного использования из кода.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value is read-only; <see langword="false" /> if it can be modified.
trans-unit.target: Значение <see langword="true" />, если значение доступно только для чтения; значение <see langword="false" />, если его можно изменять.

trans-unit.source: The string value of a control.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Данный тип или член поддерживает инфраструктуру [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] и не предназначен для непосредственного использования из кода.

trans-unit.source: A string value of the control.
